title: I do not have "ShowAlertOnComplete" in about:config
content:
I went here but it does not help me at all. https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/822640#answer-184146

I want to stop the idiotic pop up that just started... someone had this question in 2016 but it just started for me after last update.
creator: macforme

title: Why have my Yahoo Mail contacts disappeared
content: I can no longer access contacts in Yahoo Mail using Firefox. Contacts still accessible on my IPhone and while using Edge or Opera browsers on PC's.
creator: northhill

title: archivos .zip
content: Esta semana me actualizo a la version 98.0 pero para los archivos .zip, no me pregunta la opcion si quiero solo abrirlos o guardar, en la version anterior los abria sin necesidad de guardar. Como puedo habilitar nuevamente esta opcion
creator: rnavarro1

title: Website link buttons not working?
content: I've been having an issue for a while now that I can't solve because I don't know how to word it properly to ask. On certain sites (taste.com.au, reampedenergy.com.au) their link buttons don't work, usually the login ones but it has been others. They don't click, link, anything. Sometimes the address line at the bottom comes up with the JavaScript void 0 error, sometimes it doesn't come up with anything. I've cleared caches, cookies, turned off ad blockers AND it happens on different browsers and multiple computers, on both windows 10 and 11. However according to them it works fine and it's an issue on my end. I have AdBlocker Ultimate and Ghostery, but it does it on browsers that don't have any add ons.
creator: e.jenner.1985
